buy(address,bytes,address,address,uint25.details: The quoted sell amount will change only if its offset is not zero.

params.augustus: Address of the swapping contract. Must be in Paraswap's Augustus registry.
params.callData: Swap data to call `augustus`. Contains routing information.
params.newDestAmount: Adjusted amount to buy. Will be used to update callData before sent to Augustus contract.
params.offsets: Offsets in callData of the exact buy amount (`exactAmount`), maximum sell amount (`limitAmount`) and quoted sell amount (`quotedAmount`).
params.receiver: Address to which bought assets will be sent. Any leftover `srcToken` should be skimmed separately.

params.augustus: Address of the swapping contract. Must be in Paraswap's Augustus registry.
params.callData: Swap data to call `augustus`. Contains routing information.
params.marketParams: Market parameters of the market with Morpho debt. The user must have nonzero debt.
params.offsets: Offsets in callData of the exact buy amount (`exactAmount`), maximum sell amount (`limitAmount`) and quoted sell amount (`quotedAmount`).
params.onBehalf: The amount bought will be exactly `onBehalf`'s debt.
params.receiver: Address to which bought assets will be sent. Any leftover `src` tokens should be skimmed separately.

params.augustusRegistry: The address of Paraswap's registry of Augustus contracts.
params.bundler3: The address of the Bundler3 contract.
params.morpho: The address of the Morpho protocol.

params.amount: The amount of token to transfer. Pass `type(uint).max` to transfer the adapter's balance (this allows 0 value transfers).
params.receiver: The address that will receive the tokens.
params.token: The address of the ERC20 token to transfer.

params.amount: The amount of native tokens to transfer. Pass `type(uint).max` to transfer the adapter's balance (this allows 0 value transfers).
params.receiver: The address that will receive the native tokens.

sell(address,bytes,address,address,bool,.details: The quoted buy amount will change only if its offset is not zero.

params.augustus: Address of the swapping contract. Must be in Paraswap's Augustus registry.
params.callData: Swap data to call `augustus` with. Contains routing information.
params.offsets: Offsets in callData of the exact sell amount (`exactAmount`), minimum buy amount (`limitAmount`) and quoted buy amount (`quotedAmount`).
params.receiver: Address to which bought assets will be sent. Any leftover `srcToken` should be skimmed separately.
params.sellEntireBalance: If true, adjusts amounts to sell the current balance of this contract.

AUGUSTUS_REGISTRY().notice: The address of the Augustus registry.

BUNDLER3().notice: The address of the Bundler3 contract.

MORPHO().notice: The address of the Morpho contract.

buy(address,bytes,address,address,uint25.notice: Buys an exact amount. Can check for a maximum sold amount.Compatibility with Augustus versions different from 6.2 is not guaranteed.This function should be used immediately after sending tokens to the adapter, and any tokens remaining in the adapter after a swap should be transferred out immediately.

buyMorphoDebt(address,bytes,address,(add.notice: Buys an amount corresponding to a user's Morpho debt.Compatibility with Augustus versions different from 6.2 is not guaranteed.This function should be used immediately after sending tokens to the adapter, and any tokens remaining in the adapter after a swap should be transferred out immediately.

sell(address,bytes,address,address,bool,.notice: Sells an exact amount. Can check for a minimum purchased amount.Compatibility with Augustus versions different from 6.2 is not guaranteed.This function should be used immediately after sending tokens to the adapter, and any tokens remaining in the adapter after a swap should be transferred out immediately.

documentation.text: @notice The address of the Augustus registry.
@notice The address of the Morpho contract.
